Constructor Detail

MultipleHeap

MultipleHeap(java.util.Comparator[] compArray)
Creates a MultipleHeap instance using the Comparator array. The Comparator objects in the provided Comparator array are used to organize the items differently in each different heap. The number of heaps is equal to the number of items in the comparator array.

Parameters:
compArray - The comparator array composed of Comparator objects each of which compare two Items differently.
Method Detail

add

void add(E item)
Adds a new item into the heap.

Parameters:
item - The item to be added to the heap.

findFirst

public E findFirst(int criteriaIndex)
Returns the root of the heap according to the criteria identified by the index.

Parameters:
criteriaIndex - The index into the criteria array according to which the first item will be returned.
Returns:
THe root of the heap. null if the heap is empty.

getFirst

public E getFirst(int criteriaIndex)
Returns and removes the root of the heap and restructures all of the heaps so that the trees keep heap properties.

Parameters:
criteriaIndex - The index into the criteria array according to which the first item will be returned.
Returns:
THe root of the heap. null if the heap is empty.

removeAt

private void removeAt(int criteriaIndex,
                      int removeIndex)
Removes an item from the heap identified by the criteriaIndex. THen, it restores the heap structure for all of the heaps: 1. swaps the hole with its parent until the root; 2. moves the last item of the heap onto the root 3. swaps the root with its smaller child until the child is greater.

Parameters:
criteriaIndex - Index to the criteria from which the remove will be done
removeIndex - The index to the item that will be removed.

swapItems

private void swapItems(int criteriaIndex,
                       int index1,
                       int index2)
Swaps the two items in the heap pointed by indices index1 and index2

Parameters:
criteriaIndex - The criteria within which the swap operation will be performed.
index1 - INdex to the first item to be swapped
index2 - Index to the second item to be
